message: Hi Bob, for round 1 I propose an equal split: $50 for you and $50 for me. Accepting now ensures we both secure the full value before inflation cuts in for me. Looking forward to your thoughts!
Hi Alice, thanks for your offer in the first round. I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor for round 2.  Let's settle this quickly and avoid further impact from inflation.  What do you think?

Hi Bob, thanks for your proposal. Given that further rounds will reduce my shareâ€™s real value even more, I accept your offer of $40 for me and $60 for you in round 2. Looking forward to concluding our agreement!
